::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe rounds another corner, suddenly coming to a stop as he sees two 
bots pushing crates toward a door in the wall. He looks past those two bots, 
at the open hatch behind them. Freedom! All he had to do was wait till those 
bots reached the door, entered, and then he could make his escape.

DeathScythe was still cloaked from most sensors and eyesight, so he edges 
closer to the hatch, confident that they would not be able to see him.
